definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: It is years since I enjoyed myself so much.
sentences.chinese: 我好几年没玩得这样痛快了。

sentences.english: Ali was the cock of the walk for many years in boxing circles .
sentences.chinese: 阿里在拳击圈里当了好几年的头号人物。

sentences.english: Work on bioartificial liver devices has been under way for several years.
sentences.chinese: 生物人工肝装置的研究工作已经进行了好几年。

sentences.english: The house was unoccupied for several years and went to rack and ruin.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子因为好几年没有住人而荒废了。

sentences.english: Jim: Bob, I have never walked such a long distance for several years.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃，我已经好几年没走过这么长的一段路程了。

sentences.english: He has coveted after the chairmanship for years.
sentences.chinese: 他觎议长职位好几年了。

sentences.english: She's all thumbs, I'm afriad it's going to take her years to finish a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她手脚好笨哪，恐怕要好几年才能织完一件毛衣。

sentences.english: CORRESPOND】Janet and Bob corresponded for many years before they met.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和鲍伯在见面前已通了好几年信。

sentences.english: Dress code challenges like these have been cropping up for years.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的着装规范的问题已经出现好几年了。

sentences.english: She said she was looking forward to the concours because she had not shown the car in years.
sentences.chinese: 她说她期待参加巡展，因为她有好几年没秀这车了。

sentences.english: I used to be a playgirl.
sentences.chinese: 可是一个人吃饭好几年了。

sentences.english: He wishes one day he could marry a fortune that can help him in his career.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想有一天能倒插豪门，这样他能少奋斗好几年。

sentences.english: I haven't had this much fun with an open-world game in years.
sentences.chinese: 我好几年没有玩到这么牛掰的开放世界游戏了。

sentences.english: That's actually still a viable platform. We ran for years on FCGI.
sentences.chinese: 那也是一个可用的平台，我们用了好几年。

sentences.english: Years have been spent in compiling this volume.
sentences.chinese: 编辑本卷花了好几年时间。

sentences.english: I have known him quite well for several years since he first came to work in our department.
sentences.chinese: 他一到本系工作，我就认识他，已经好几年了。

definition: a few years/several years/how many years
a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
a good deal of/quite a lot
